title: Institutional Repository (IR) Utilization Strategies for Higher Education Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in managing educational materials
context.additional_context: Blended learning program for in-service practitioners (corporate training officers) conducted in smartphone-centered constrained technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic structure and operational principles of an Institutional Repository (IR)
Learners can design and implement an educational/research resource management system utilizing IR
Learners can develop educational strategies integrating IR with mobile devices in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
